toast.title: Copied :D
toast.description: You can now share it with anyone.

home.title: Michel Domingos
home.description: A guy who loves helping people and making the world a better place.

about.title: About | Michel Domingos
about.description: I started at DevWorld with PHP in 2015, and since then I've been on this road as a Developer. In early 2021, I started working with Javascript, so the passion for this language and its Frameworks emerged. My focus is Front-end Development, but I also have a great facility with Back-end Development.

projects.title: Projects | Michel Domingos
projects.description: Side projects are a way to convert your thoughts and personality into code. Here you can see the different {{totalProjects}} projects I've been working on.

books.title: Books
books.description: Project carried out to create an authentication environment.

weather.title: Weather
weather.description: Project carried out to read weather information when choosing a specific city.

movies.title: Movies
movies.description: Project carried out to consume data from the TMDB api and create a store with a list of products.

contact.title: Contact | Michel Domingos
contact.tagline: Email me. As in the good old days.
contact.description: I love talking with other developers, students, and newbies. I'm a pretty busy guy so I can't promise that I'll answer your email on time, but I'll do my best to get back to you ASAP.

success.title: Email sent :P
success.description: Thanks for taking the time to write it.

fail.title: Error :(
fail.description: Something wrong happened. Try again later.
